meanings.def: a person, especially a police officer, whose job is to investigate crimes and catch criminals
examples: Several objects were taken away by detectives from the anti-terrorist squad.
Sherlock Holmes was Conan Doyle's fictional detective.
Thomson was the lead detective in the Ramsay case.
A team of around 30 detectives and uniformed officers have been working on the case.
He was arrested in Spain by Scotland Yard detectives.

meanings.def: a person employed by somebody to find out information about somebody/something
